eksath jathika paksha ki්rayakari tharuna tharuniyan dasa dahasak shi්ra lanka nidahas paksha samajikayan lesa bandawa ganimata waththala shi්ralanipa aasana sanwidhayakawarayata hakiwi atha.ejapa ki්rayakarin wu mowun ejapa nayakathwaya gana kalakiri shi්ralanipayata bandunu bawath ee anuwa pasugiya wasara dekaka kalaye samajikayan pahalos dahasak bandawa ganimata hakiwu bawath waththala nawa sanwidhayaka thushara perera mahatha ‘silumina’ ta kiya.ee anuwa shakha 47 k pawathi sanwidhana me wana wita 120 dakwa wadikara ganimata hakiwi atha.me athara waththala pa්radeshiya sabhawa ha nagara sabhawa ejapa palanaya yatathe pawathiyada aasanaye janathawata sahanayak nolabena bawin waththala aasanaye janathawage uwamanawan itu kirimata thaman paudgalikawama madihath wu bawath owunage uwamana epakam itukirima me wanawitath arambaa athi bawada ee mahatha awadharanaya kaleya.ee anuwa miliyana nawasiyayak pamana wiyadam kota nawa palam thunak idikarana bawath eeta amatharawa gampaha disthi්rakkaye podu maha janathawa wenuwen thawath wadapiliwela rasak arambaa athi bawada ohu kiweya.
